name: LET'S BE FREE
description:
WARNING - LOUD NOISES AND FLASHING LIGHTS

Everyone struggles in life.

But what if you didn't have you?

Here, Primary Color Man can set you free. But he needs to be set free first.

So, why not give him a helping hand? He's waiting :D

Once you complete the game, YOU CANNOT PLAY IT AGAIN/RESET THE GAME.

Made in 20 hours over the span of 3 days.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Look around - Mouse

Jump - Space Bar

Left Shift - Sprint (In select stages)

Credits:

Adam Woodsmith - Guy Behind "Primary Color Man"

Vidas Games - Helped With My Crappy Code

Trial By Fire Games - Emotional Support

Poppy Playtime Soundtrack - No More Hugs
